choices: Professor Tweety's prop and set building class
Professor Coyote's Chase Technique ("Cat and Mouse") class
1.content:
You're late!

The bell tower on the roof of the Looniversity just finished chiming before you rounded the corner. Out of breath, you sprint through the gaping doors and into the main hall of the Looniversity. You make a mad dash for...
1.title: Late again

choices: you feel a tingle at your feet
the class below you is a tickling class
below you is a cave where some loony charecters go for some fun
11.content:
running late you sprint to professor Fudds booby traps. you run in and you fall through a hole. you get stuck at your arms and try to get out but you are stuck.

"ok class this is the simple covering the whole trick. read pages 211-220 tonight and well go over those Monday in class
the class gets up and leaves and the professor walks out to.

"wait you forgot me"
11.title: Professor Fudd's Booby Traps class

111.content: you look down through the limited visibility to see that a mouse is running along your feet! you try to contain your laughter, but it won't hold forever...
111.title: you feel a tingle at your feet

1111.content: you don't let the mouse win too easily as you concentrate on holding it in. but then, the mouse spots some food scraps and gets excited, wiggling its little tail on your bare soles!
1111.title: contain laughter

11111.content: 3 more mice come and run along your feet
11111.title: keep resisting

111111.content: you try to shake them off, but they get scared and start running around some more, tickling your feet more intensely.
111111.title: *try to shake them off*

112.content: you her the muffled voices laughing and constant "coochy-coo!" from below the class. you suddenly realize it is the tickle class you never wanted. suddenly, someone shouts: "hey! it's buster's feet! let's get 'em!" everyone starts mercilessly tickling your feet, making you uncontrollably laugh.
112.title: the class below you is a tickling class

1121.content: you try to get out from the hole, but the classmates pull you back down and tie your feet to hooks on the floor. you then hear one of them say "get the frilly feathers!!" you feel more nervous, but the feathers begin tickling your helpless feet. it looks as if you are going to break out in laughter any time now....
1121.title: try to get free

11212.content: the resisting becomes harder. tears are running down your cheeks. they suddenly begin to combine the feathers with their nails as the "coochy coo! gets louder. you can feel your legs shivering...
11212.title: keep resisting

choices: finally release and laugh your head off
112122.content:
you don't break so easily, but their constant tickling is kick-starting something in your brain. an awful thought suddenly tugs at your mind as you suddenly remember the 40 oz. water bottle you finished before entering the looniversity.

if you keep resisting any longer, you'll wet yourself for sure!!!
112122.title: remember something awful...

1121221.content:
still, you keep resisting despite the tears running down your cheeks and thighs shaking. not before long, a warm sensation goes all over your pelvis. to your horror, you look down and see the wet spot on your pants. their constant tickling has caused you to wet yourself. the class finally releases you and you're able to get out. but the class behind you has noticed your stain and laughter instantly fills the halls.

END
1121221.title: resist and wet yourself

choices: twetty teaches a lesson about being late
tweety leaves and hits a switch
twetty leaves and smoene comes in
twettty leaves and a animal comes in
12.content: you run in and trip. you fall into stocks your feet get locked in and your hands fall on the hand cuffs which lock and stretch your hands over your head. you are wearing a tight shirt. "this is how they would torture people in the old days. ok are next class is Monday. we have Thursday and friday off. everyone leaves
12.title: Professor Tweety's prop and set building class

123.content: as twetty leaves he hits a switch on the wall.
123.title: tweety leaves and hits a switch

choices: feathers come out of the stocks
a back tcracher comes out of the stocks
fingers come out of the stocks
1231.content: your arms raise high. your wearing a small shirt that barely reaches your shorts. when it raises your arms higher your shirt goes all the way to your ribcage.
1231.title: arms rais tighter

12313.content: out of the stocks come two hands. the slowly move up your shirt on goes onto your ribs and the other goes onto the armpits.
12313.title: fingers come out of the stocks

125.content: You hear a animal walk in it is a.
125.title: twettty leaves and a animal comes in

choices: Excuse me, why are you looking at my feet.
13.content:
You run right into class and immedialtey into the cold hard stare of Professer Daffy Duckk.

Late again I see?

Im sorry sir.

Your despicable. Now sit in the back of the class.

You take the only seat in class next to your friend Elmrya. Hi she said in her sweet little voice. You responded with a quick hello and looked down noticing Elmrya was wearing sandals with no socks. Elmrya notices.

What does she say?
13.title: Professor Daffy's Villian Method class

15.content: locked damit, you run to class without going to the bathrom and all you can think about all period is how much u have to pee.
15.title: The bathroom!

info.brief_description: I think it's safe to say that this one is self-explanatory.
info.description: They're tiny, they're toony, and they're altogether ticklish.
